item.description:
May 22nd 2012: Medical Affairs, Clinical, Regulatory, Career Paths

Location:Massbio Offices, 300 Technology Square, 8th Floor, Cambridge MA 02139

Time: 5:30-8:00pm

Moderator: Laurie Halloran, President and CEO, Halloran Consulting Group

Panelists: Eric Silberstein, CEO, TrialNetworks; Joanne Lager MD, Project Head for PI3K Inhibitors, Sanofi Oncology; Shawna Cullen, PhD, Clinical Trial Head - Oncology Translational Medicine, Novartis Institutes for BioMedical Research, Inc.

Â 

To register: http://fils52012.eventbrite.com/
